ygData.subject: RE: Root-breaking and Selo
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi!  oh yah another death in Fear, a common daily occurrence. thank god for resurrection spells or there s no way i d still be level 50 =) Shada
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! oh yah another death in Fear, a common daily occurrence.
thank god for resurrection spells or there's no way i'd still be level 50 =)

Shada


> From: email@... (Melaniel)
>
>
> Do you remember a recent patch that changed Treeform so druids
> couldn't move while as a tree? Well hold onto your drums but Selo's
> breaks the tree's roots, and the lovely druids can start being
> wandering trees again.
>
> Not sure if people have mentioned this already, but it sure caused a
> stir in East Commons when me and my sis were roaming around and I had
> this big tree chasing after me!!
>
> Anyone taking odds that this will get changed in a patch coming soon
> to a computer near you?
>
> Oh, and a big hi to Shada, who I saw sitting naked in front of the
> bank during the auction, as us wood elves seem to have a habit of
> doing! Hope you didn't die somewhere too awful sis!
>
> See ya all
>
> --
>
> Saldara
> High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server
>
> Melaniel
> Wood Elf Bard (10), Mith Marr server
